commands.name: az network dns record-set aaaa add-record
commands.syntax:
az network dns record-set aaaa add-record --ipv6-address
                                          --record-set-name
                                          --resource-group
                                          --zone-name
                                          [--if-none-match]
                                          [--ttl]
examples:
az network dns record-set aaaa add-record -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -n MyRecordSet -a MyIpv6Address

commands.name: az network dns record-set aaaa create
commands.syntax:
az network dns record-set aaaa create --name
                                      --resource-group
                                      --zone-name
                                      [--if-match]
                                      [--if-none-match]
                                      [--metadata]
                                      [--target-resource]
                                      [--tm-profile]
                                      [--ttl]
examples: az network dns record-set aaaa create -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet --metadata owner=WebTeam

commands.name: az network dns record-set aaaa delete
commands.syntax:
az network dns record-set aaaa delete [--ids]
                                      [--if-match]
                                      [--name]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--subscription]
                                      [--yes]
                                      [--zone-name]
examples: az network dns record-set aaaa delete -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network dns record-set aaaa list
commands.summary: List AAAA record sets in a zone.
commands.syntax:
az network dns record-set aaaa list --resource-group
                                    --zone-name
                                    [--max-items]
                                    [--next-token]
                                    [--recordsetnamesuffix]
                                    [--top]
examples: az network dns record-set aaaa list -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network dns record-set aaaa remove-record
commands.summary: Remove AAAA record from its record set.
commands.syntax:
az network dns record-set aaaa remove-record --ipv6-address
                                             --record-set-name
                                             --resource-group
                                             --zone-name
                                             [--keep-empty-record-set]
examples:
az network dns record-set aaaa remove-record -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -n MyRecordSet -a MyIpv6Address

commands.name: az network dns record-set aaaa show
commands.syntax:
az network dns record-set aaaa show [--ids]
                                    [--name]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--subscription]
                                    [--zone-name]
examples: az network dns record-set aaaa show -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network dns record-set aaaa update
commands.syntax:
az network dns record-set aaaa update [--add]
                                      [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--ids]
                                      [--if-match]
                                      [--if-none-match]
                                      [--metadata]
                                      [--name]
                                      [--remove]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--set]
                                      [--subscription]
                                      [--target-resource]
                                      [--tm-profile]
                                      [--zone-name]
examples: az network dns record-set aaaa update -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet --metadata owner=WebTeam
